content: - knit across needles 1 & 4 knit across 2 & 3 in pattern repeat row 1 & 2 until there are 16 stitches left on needles 1 & 4 foot continue working chart on needles 2 & 3 and stockinette stitch on needles 1 & 4 until foot is about 2 inches less than desired foot length for my socks i knit 18 pattern repeats toe row 1 needles 1 & 3 knit until there are 3 stitches k2tog k1 needles 2 & 4 k1 ssk knit remaining stitches row 2 knit across all stitches repeat row 1 & 2 until there are 8 stitches left per needle then knit row 1 until there are 5 stitches per needle knit across 5 stitches on needle 1 cut yarn leaving a 12 inches tail and bind off using the kitchener stitch weave in ends leg chart chart key knit right side/purl wrong side purl right side/knit wrong side this is the part of the pattern where most people say this is for personal use only i don t have any problems with you knitting these socks for whatever purpose you want to do with them please just do not give out the pattern itself thanks and i hope you enjoy them aimee perez
